name: Spectrum Dream
description:
The game is available in Google Play.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.clash.dream

W, A, D - movement

Double click - skip dialog

Enter - Enter the door

This is an unusual platformer game about a man who got into the zx spectrum computer operating system. Your visit is the last in the world, after which this place will become unsuitable for other travelers. Explore this extraordinary world, avoid traps and reach the end to help the inhabitants of this world, this universe.
The game was inspired by Sinclair Zx-Spectrum computers and classic games and platform games. The sound accompaniment was chiptune and other sounds known from childhood and the era of 8-bit consoles Sega, Nintendo, Atari.
The game's plot is very simple. You are the person who makes a visit to the universe of computer systems with the aim of enjoying the views and atmosphere one last time. Soon you realize that the main teleporter needs to be brought back into working order. This is where your little journey across the big world begins. This is a dream. Your dream.
